nodes.text: Nima'tar was a female green-skinned Twi'lek scholar, remembered for her theories and writings regarding Hutt society.
She was Jabba Desilijic Tiure's slave dancer just before the position was filled by Oola.
Nima'tar was the lead singer in a band, which had toured the galaxy and ended up playing for Jabba the Hutt. She toured with the band to pay for her tuition and the time to share her thesis.
During their performance, she witnessed another Twi'lek girl defy Jabba and being fed to his pet rancor.

Her band sold her into slavery to get off-world and Nima'tar remained Jabba's slave, working on her thesis. When Oola first arrived at the palace, Nima'tar began to fear for her own life, knowing that Jabba was going to replace her. She managed to escape with many of the notes she had taken, with the help of Tamtel Skreej.
